name: Chomper
overview: Chomper is an arcade game with some similarities to Pac-Man for the 8-bit Atari. The player controls the Chomper, who must eat all of the dots in a maze. 4 monsters hunt the player, and try to prevent them from this task. If the player contacts a monster, they lose a life. If the player eats all the dots, they move to a level with faster and more intelligent monsters. The player starts with 3 lives, and when all are lost, it's game over.
